mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.model AS "model", a.price AS "price", a.nums AS "nums", a.storedept AS "storedept", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_item( id, name, type, model, price, nums, storedept, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{model}, #{price}, #{nums}, #{storedept}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_item SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, model = #{model}, price = #{price}, nums = #{nums}, storedept = #{storedept}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
